T.query: select ms.id as msid, ms.parent_id, ms.is_production, s.id as sid from medidata_studies as ms join studies as s on ms.id = s.external_id where ms.name like 'SmokeTest%' and ms.is_production='f' and s.can_generate_blocks='t' and s.external_id > 45230;

F.query: select ms.id as msid, ms.parent_id, ms.is_production, s.id as sid from medidata_studies as ms join studies as s on ms.id = s.external_id where ms.name like 'SmokeTest%' and ms.is_production='f' and s.can_generate_blocks='t' and s.external_id > 45235;
